marytts.vocalizations

Class VocalizationUnitFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.vocalizations.VocalizationUnitFileReader

  • public class VocalizationUnitFileReader
extends Object
    Loads a unit file in memory and provides accessors to the start times and durations.
    Author:
    sathish pammi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VocalizationUnitFileReader()
      Empty constructor; need to call load() separately.
      VocalizationUnitFileReader(String fileName)
      Create a unit file reader from the given unit file

        Returns:

      • isEdgeUnit

        public boolean isEdgeUnit(int i)
        Determine whether the unit number i is an "edge" unit, i.e. a unit marking the start or the end of an utterance.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the considered unit.
        Returns:
        true if the unit is an edge unit in the unit file, false otherwise
